name: Trash Dealer: A Trash Cleaning Simulator
name_original: Trash Dealer: A Trash Cleaning Simulator
description:
This is a game where you, the player, will start a trash-cleaning business. You will play as the truck driver that goes around the stage to clean and collect the trash. Then, after collecting the needed money, you will expand your business to open more branches in other cities.

How to play:

  1. Choose a map
  2. Upgrade your truck to increase its capabilities (Speed, Fuel, Garbage capacity, Collect rate)
  3. Press play
  4. Control your truck by using the arrow buttons
  5. All Interactable buildings will be highlighted by a white outline
    1. Processing building -> Place to drop and sort your trash.
    2. Repair shop -> Place to spawn if you crash your truck.
    3. Gas Station -> Place to re-fuel the truck.
  6. Press the "Take Button" to gather the trashes.
  7. If your capacity is max, go to the processing area, a minigame of sorting will start
    1. Biowaste trash -> Wasted food
    2. Paper waste trash -> Paper
    3. Plastic waste trash ->  Plastics
  8. Remember to keep your fuel at bay!
  9. Make sure to obey the traffic lights!
  10. Good luck, and Have fun!

Made by:

  •  Kevin Leonardrich - 2440041535  (Game Designer/ Game Programmer)
  • Raka Kiyosaki - 2440042935 (2D Sprite Artist)
  • Imanuel Eklesio - 2440044190 (2D Sprite Artist)
